positive_examples: This is an example of history museum.
The history museum demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed history museum in this context.
A typical case of history museum would involve these features.
The concept of history museum applies here.
A museum that preserves and displays artifacts, documents, and exhibits related to historical events and periods.
negative_examples: This is an example of art museum, not history museum.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: ArtMuseum, or other types of Museum

definition: An institution dedicated to preserving and displaying historical artifacts and narratives.
